description:
This checkbox build with the Radix primitive: https://www.radix-ui.com/docs/primitives/components/checkbox.
Example:
```jsx
<Widget src="near/widget/DIG.Checkbox" props={{ id: "checkbox-item", label: "Accept terms and conditions" }}
```
### Props
`id` - associates checkbox with label (`string`).

`label` - text for checkbox (`string`).

This component also accepts all `Checkbox.Root` props as outlined in the Radix documentation.
name: DIG.Checkbox
